forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco paints a picture of calm clarity; vibrant blue skies stretch over the city, punctuated only by wisps of cirrus clouds that drift lazily in the gentle west wind. The temperature hovers softly at around 62 degrees, inviting you to step outside and enjoy the fleeting warmth before it dips into the evening chill. With the sun illuminating the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge to the northwest, the panorama is unmarred by fog, providing a crisp view of the city that beckons one to wander the sunlit streets.

As the day wanes and a cool tranquility sets in, expect temperatures to drop to a mellow 47 degrees tonight. The evening sky will embrace a partly cloudy sorbet of dusk hues, perfect for a casual stroll along the waterfront or perhaps an intimate meeting with friends at a local café. Dress in layers—a light sweater and a cozy jacket will keep you comfortable as the west-southwest winds whisper through the avenues. Consider indulging in the warmth of a bowl of clam chowder from a beloved spot or simply savoring the peaceful ambiance of the city as day transitions into night. The scene is set for appreciation, an invitation to relish the subtle charm of a San Francisco evening.
